review: Did not work for me. I think it was my wifi strength.
author: B. Marina

review: It does everything I could hope it would do. Very satisfied.  Great product.
author: Stanley Woodson

review: This works fine, but it's somewhat different from what I'm used to.  I have it in my bedroom and have to put on my readers to navigate the channels and choose episodes to watch.  I like my Roku much better.....but it might just be a learning curve.  I'm sure I'll appreciate it once I get used to it.  It does pretty much the same thing as my Roku, just not as easily.
author: lindadello

review: Not only does this give me access to Netflix, it accesses my Amazon Prime and my Amazon Cloud. Love it!!!!
author: Dukke

review: I love that I can use miracast to play stuff using my phones data plan if I was at a hotel or something. Way better than Chromecast. Worth every penny.
author: Steve

review: Who needs a smart TV? Excellent gift I received!
author: BBABY1

review: So happy with this small "stick" that enables me to view from my TV screen instead of the computer.
author: Brenda D.

review: Fire TV Stick is everything I thought it would be, highly recommended!
author: Johnnie L. Johnson Sr.
